author: Nicole Morley
title: RyanAir launch Article 50 sale with flights to Europe for just ÂŁ9.99
text:
Ryanair have launched an Article 50 sale (Picture: Getty) RyanAir have launched an Article 50 sale. 
The low-cost airline are offering flights to 50 European destinations from as little as ÂŁ9.99.
How a bad Brexit deal could make the UK vulnerable to terror attacks Unlike the two-year countdown sparked by Article 50, bargain hunters have only until midnight to secure a cheap RyanAir flight.
The reduced flights depart from London Stansted, Glasgow, Manchester, Edinburgh, Liverpool, Leeds, Belfast International, Birmingham, Bournemouth, Bristol, Derry, Luton and Newcastle.
These ÂŁ9.99 seat sale fares are available now but must be booked before midnight Thursday (30 Mar) and can only be found on the Ryanair.com website.

Search for missing helicopter with 5 on board resumes after bad weather 
Schoolgirl, 12, died after inhaling fumes from deodorant she sprayed on herself
